|stock_os=ZyNOS;v3.60(JM.2); |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=ZyXEL |default_ssid_regex=^ZyXEL$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=1234 |oui=00:A0:C5 |oui_eth=00:A0:C5 |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|Parental Control Gateway Router with 802.11g Wireless}}
[http://www.zywall.com/upload/download_library/HS100W_v1_datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
[http://www.zywall.com/upload/download_library/HS100-HS100W_v3.62_userguide.pdf User's Guide]
[http://www.zywall.com/upload/download_library/HS100W-QSG.pdf QSG] "ZyXEL", "P/N: 45-401-000365", and "Made in Taiwan" is silkscreened on the main board. :"XG-601 V02," "70-480301-01", and "2003 12 11" is silkscreened on the XG-601 wireless module. The board layout is essentially identical to that used by the [[ZyXEL Prestige 334W (P-334W)]]. The ZX1600 chip is omitted on this model.. but the pads for it (and additional associated components) remain. [http://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/HS-100W On the Linux-mips wiki] ==Additional external links== ===Reviews=== [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/24718-reviewhs100w Review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (dated 2005-01-03)
